attributes.action: WOULD YOU ACCEPT COALITION GOVERNMENT,ASK THIS QUESTION ON BALLOT PAPER
attributes.additional_details:
ON ALL  GENERAL ELECTION BALLOT  PAPERS,ASK THE QUESTION IF THE VOTER WOULD BE WILLING TO ACCEPT A COALITION GOVERNMENT   SIMPLY ANSWER YES OR NO...WE MUST NEVER AGAIN THE VICTIMS OF AN UNELECTED COALITION  WHO CAN IGNORE THE ELECTION  PROMISES THEY MADE BY SAYING"  WERE A COALITION  SO ANYTHING WE PROMISED  OR PLEDGED IS NO LONGER VALID "
WE TRY TO PROMOTE DEMOCRACY AROUND THE WORLD  ,AND WE HAVE A GOVERNMENT   WHO WERE VOTED FOR BY NO ONE..WE MUST ASK THE QUESTION  . MAKE  POLITICIANS OF ALL PARTIES  ACCOUNTABLE TO US
